content: प्रहा {c3c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To give up, forsake, abandon, relinquish; प्रजहाति यदा कामान् <ls>Bg. 2. 55</ls>, <ls n="Bg. 2.">39</ls>; मादेमेतौ प्रहास्येते <ls>Rām.</ls> {@--2@} To let go, cast, discharge; प्रजहुः शूलपट्टिशान् <ls>Bk. 14. 23.</ls> {@--3@} To depart from. {%--<ab>Pass.</ab>%} {@--1@} To be forsaken or neglected. {@--2@} To be lost, to perish. {@--3@} To vanish, cease, disappear.
प्रहा <ab>Ved.</ab> A good throw at dice, gain.
